title: Jason Cruz
summary: Jason Alexander Cruz (born February 6, 1974) is the American lead singer and lyricist of punk band, Strung Out, which formed in 1989 when he was 15 years old. He is also an artist, and a poet and fronts his roots Americana band 'Jason Cruz and Howl'. His personal website showcases his various forms of original artwork (paintings as well as graphic design and photography).
